title: 2016 Halloween Mystery Gift Pumpkin Icon
body: Hey. I was just wondering if i will receive my Halloween mystery gift pumpkin icon for gifting a friend during the halloween event. Thanks

replies.body: We're still sending those icons out until *November 17th*. If you don't have it by then, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll help you out.
same, been wondering where it is. but the noting said 2 weeks after 11/3 and such.
